description: Enable AI assistants to search and retrieve detailed book and author information from the Open Library. Provide structured, consistent JSON responses for book titles, author details, and cover images. Enhance AI capabilities with comprehensive book and author data access via a standardized protocol.

capabilities.name: get_book_by_title
capabilities.description: Search for a book by its title on Open Library.

capabilities.name: get_authors_by_name
capabilities.description: Search for author information on Open Library.

capabilities.name: get_author_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information for a specific author using their Open Library Author Key (e.g. OL23919A).

capabilities.name: get_author_photo
capabilities.description: Get the URL for an author's photo using their Open Library Author ID (OLID e.g. OL23919A).

capabilities.name: get_book_cover
capabilities.description: Get the URL for a book's cover image using a key (ISBN, OCLC, LCCN, OLID, ID) and value.

capabilities.name: get_book_by_id
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a book using its identifier (ISBN, LCCN, OCLC, OLID).
